sources.title: Hacker Leaks 73M Records from Indian HDFC Bank Subsidiary - Hackread
sources.snippet: A hacker using the alias Kernelware has leaked 7.5 GB of customer data belonging to HDB Financial Services, a subsidiary of India's largest private bank, HDFC Bank.
